      • ClassState

        public ClassState(PersistentMemory memoryManager,
          Class classObject)
        Create ClassState instance for a given class.
        Parameters:
        memoryManager - PersistentMemory instance that manages this FieldState hierarchy.
        classObject - Class to be wrapped in this FieldState.

      • ClassState

        protected ClassState(PersistentMemory memoryManager,
          String className)
        Create ClassState instance based on class name during de-serialization.
        Parameters:
        memoryManager - PersistentMemory instance that manages this FieldState hierarchy.
        className - Class name.

        Retrieve Class object for the class stored in this ClassState.
        Returns:
        Class instance.

      • revertClass

        public final ClassState revertClass()
        Revert class to reflect image stored in ClassState. Skips reversal if refresh tag indicates that class state matches current state data.
        Returns:
        this object instance (for convenience)

      • internalRevertClass

        protected void internalRevertClass()
        Revert class to reflect image stored in ClassState.

      • refreshClass

        public final ClassState refreshClass(boolean noDeepRefresh)
        Refresh image stored in ClassState to reflect current class. Skips refresh if refresh tag indicates that class state contains current state data.
        Parameters:
        noDeepRefresh - Do not recursively refresh the state of existing objects.
        Returns:
        this object instance (for convenience)

      • internalRefreshClass

        protected void internalRefreshClass(boolean noDeepRefresh)
        Refresh image stored in ClassState to reflect current class.
        Parameters:
        noDeepRefresh - Do not recursively refresh the state of existing objects.

      • internalPingClass

        protected void internalPingClass()
        Ping ClassState to prevent garbage collection.
